title: Merchant Ale House
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, American, Western, Fast food, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Brewpub that brews craft beer on site and offers other craft beers from outside breweries. Dimly lit with live music sometimes. Has a few vegan choices on the menu, including a vegan shawarma and the white bean dip with pita; plus soups, nachos, and dips can be made vegan upon request. Feb 2013: the portobello burger was replaced by a housemade veggie burger, which could be made vegan by omitting curry mayonaise. Has daiya cheese.
